Reviews.Title: “Exceeded expectations”
Reviews.Author: Nuzzzzie
Reviews.Content: frequent traveler like visiting madrid almost every 2 weeks year average business holiday inn madrid become like second home much hotels one convenient warm clean comfortable rooms right size feel home rooms necessary furniture wifi able work comfortably night meetings hotel team service excellent welcoming rich breakfast morning plenty restaurants neighborhood located location madrid near paseo de la night hectic noisy area old city madrid

Reviews.Title: “Great Break in Madrid”
Reviews.Author: Maywex
Reviews.Content: hotel guess average area business center really isnt business center 3 computers 1 printer 2 phones hotel overall fine

Reviews.Title: “Nice upgrade”
Reviews.Author: John W
Reviews.Content: hotel placed next stadium close metro bus connection 2 3 minutes walk lobby rooms offered exactly needed calm space breakfast great excellent choice hot cold items better way start day

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: Staro311
Reviews.Content: come madrid since many years business purposes initially trying wide selection different hotels felt comfortable holiday inn since chose always business trips rooms comfortable modern maintained highest standards eg flatscreen tvs wireless rooms perfect etc im particularly careful cleanliness bathrooms never ever found another guests hair sink floor staff always helpfull friendly mostly effort big help possible way priority club card make feel guest breakfast buffet ever need want eat evening restaurant good quality price another bonus hotel outdoors swimming pool roof hotel madrid 7 months swimming pool weather pleasant treat days work location perfect well business purposes bernabeu stadium metro 200 meter also close madrids biggest shopping centre corte ingles literally find everything plenty excellent well small fancy restaurants 500 meter around hotel since year also direct metro line barajas airport ends 500 meter hotel better choice holiday inn im madrid

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended!!”
Reviews.Author: Laurhol
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights february madrid first book hotel downtown however found subway stop 2 min walk away booked price much much lower hotels downtown hotel close sports stadium time trip correctly might able see real madrid play game getting downtown easy takes 20 min tried subway well bus get pass public transportation hop buses trains needed least 2 bus lines going downtown hotel didnt wait longer 15 min subway appeared frequent faster one almost every 5 min unlike states vending machine could buy waiting subway madrid also cleanest subway ive ever seen clean new safe nyc london paris hotel also feels new fancy usual holiday inn america im priority club member usually stay holiday inns staff front desk spoke fluent english check easy service average lobby upscale marble great flower expensive furniture room good size looked new clean bathroom amenities usual including movies english didnt try restaurant business center good free definitely recommend stay great value easy cheap get historic center

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: SDAG
Reviews.Content: stayed recently 2 weeks business much enjoyed location business area thats true santiago bernabeu stadium 5min walking hotel hotel building rooms nothing special quite good overall clean good service tv bit ok best part swimming pool summer top floor 10th swimming pool open summer 9am till 9pm excellent came white madrid left looking like every day office swim suit onto sun bed fantastic also sauna jacuzzi reasonable gym facilities ok overall good business choice

Reviews.Title: “Don't panic - it's actually fine!”
Reviews.Author: Intrepid75
Reviews.Content: typical holiday inn guess reasonable standards round nothing spectacular definitely location financial district madrid far removed cultural heart fact found surroundings depressing buildings clearly late 70s early 80s surrounding streets felt little unsafe although problem walking around fortunately public transportation available either metro bus youre holiday time premium last thing want travel necessary well anyway perfect youre fan santiago bernabeu stadium home real madrid team right opposite sells real madrid lousy gym poor selection equipment would recommend tourists choose hotels downtown area eg gran via retiro

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel in City Centre”
Reviews.Author: TJS191
Reviews.Content: yet another standard hotel booked holiday inn whilst nothing brilliant rooms clean bed quite reasonable service pleasant

Reviews.Title: “Delicious and various breakfast makes it up for other things”
Reviews.Author: pepca
Reviews.Content: outside hotel old run rooms nice small nice hi location best right around metro get downtown would stay think good value lacking like hotel booked executive room web states free mini bar get one drink bar day

Reviews.Title: “Traditional”
Reviews.Author: Juhani T
Reviews.Content: due good experience two reliable holiday inns recent trip france decided choose holiday inn time weekend madrid hotel building big office complex made rooms big although bit oldfashioned well staff friendly ready help also share old conversation good people madrid course spanish moreover think hotel near big avenue madrid north south hotel 5 3 miles north del prado example lots buses go along avenue pay cash provided change bus nicer subway enjoy avenue length imagine however bit inconvenient raining days would warmly recommend avoid crossing office complex night security reasons easy hotel situated complex problem day breakfast excellent really average

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for citytrip”
Reviews.Author: Slangenburgh
Reviews.Content: booked 4 day mini break family excellent experience hotel situated north city 300 metres metro excellent system distance santiago home real madrid well worth tour even dont really follow football upgraded junior suite without asking giving us space kids room clean well equipped couldnt fault except minor noise lifts unfortunately common many others madrid reception staff could helpful area surrounding hotel business tourist still interest families trip centre sol takes 15 mins metro tourist tickets cheap breakfast buffet fantastic didnt eat hotel otherwise wont go hungry madrid long wait 9pm evening meal nothing happens

Reviews.Title: “An odd hotel but in a good location”
Reviews.Author: traveljuno
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel booked tour location great albeit exactly action good enough plenty things within walking distance easily get around madrid via metro bus taxi location hotel clean quiet adequate however find service sometimes issue directions things difficult get everything within 10 minutes per even 100 miles ice another trouble dont expect free ice

Reviews.Title: “Many good features!”
Reviews.Author: Poskers
Reviews.Content: thought hotel good location minutes centre staff friendly helpful would liked stay central hotel believe would noisy sleep night twin room good size larger single beds comfortable good teacoffee making facilities would recommend eating hotel restaurant food okay limited choice seemed quite pricey got plenty local restaurants reasonably priced however make breakfast say wow never seen choice like pastries pancakes fruit fresh fruit salad big fruit meats cheeses biscuits yoghurts fried breakfast could go gym handy anyone wanting keep fitness busy finally best bit rooftop pool long day sightseeing great go chill sun pool roof lose sun 9pm great sun

Reviews.Title: “Very central, but old and tired”
Reviews.Author: LukeOnTheRoad
Reviews.Content: son returned lovely 3 night break holiday inn main reason visiting madrid visit real madrid stadium literally 5 minutes road hotel well worth visit football fan even enjoyed tour plenty good shops nearby found lots places eat spent hours pool roof soaked sun lovely jacuzzi sauna even bit small great hotel easy access metro easy get airport wonderful place

Reviews.Title: “LOUD air conditioning units”
Reviews.Author: AnnTea
Reviews.Content: stay business 5 nights found hotel great location near stadium breakfast excellant great choice fruits continental hot foods lots room service prompt 20 minutes ordering hotel room 8th floor views werent great room well double bed large sofa bathroom fine bath overhead shower room quiet even ac full blast gym hotel medium size basic equipment 2 machine 2 x free weight 2 x weight machine area gym included separate male female sauna swimming pool roof didnt use small jacuzzi also also private full gym called holiday gym part hotel assume would fee use check eating metro 5 minute walk hotel right right takes stadium left left takes station 10 minutes gran euro 1 way shopping centre right right hotel behind hotel several reasonable shops opinion united colours well known also nice italian restaurant great food shops nearby straight left hotel include el corte ingles would definately stay nice hotel courteous staff

Reviews.Content: returned four night stay holiday inn madrid good round experience twin room clean good size beds making facility choice pillows experience noise night slight ac sound like someone trying enter room enough prevent sleep breakfast brilliant lots choice including pancakes large variety fresh fruit cereal breads pastries eggs bacon fresh juice fake stuff meal restaurant one night food ok enough choice menu would recommend using local restaurants instead rooftop pool sauna whirlpool welcome oasis sight seeing day pool cold first hit lovely location good us two ladies sight seeing far enough away noise city close enough city accessible either metro tourist bus used also short metro ride barajas airport would recommend hotel found staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as the reviews would suggest!”

Reviews.Content: spent almost 7 nights hotel stay good bad good points hotel good location close stores restaurants famous madrid metro best way get around city room nice size generally kept clean problem traffic noise good tub bathroom always water even left water running keep water level bath room made funny noises times thought someone trying access room would recommend hotel maybe nights beyond say far city centre tourist beware pick pocket 2 time day el metro

Reviews.Content: stayed overnight twice holiday inn madrid way south american vacation rather join 12 hr flight 5 hr flight back home spent night madrid therefore simply get good nights rest decent meal explore madrid said first leg take cab plaza mayor historic center 15 mins ride taxis available hotel staff great allowed us early check hassle assisted us booking large taxi accomodate suitcases great breakfast buffet although restaurant dinner great better walk outside 5 minutes direction wide variety decent restaurants hotel right opposite real madrid santiago stadium might get noisy game nights hand game perfectly located rooms got times roomy modern housekeeping room service great airport 30 mins euro trip holiday inn madrid purpose perfectly

Reviews.Content: arrived hotel good friday 2007 room ready early reception staff welcoming friendly questions staff happy help bar excellent bar snacks served every drink bar man brilliant reception room clean spacious felt must recently refurbishment really modern throughout great time definitely recommend return

Reviews.Content: stayed holiday inn madrid family pre christmas weekend break booked hotel ago seriously considered ready poor reviews website glad ignored hotel good location situated 5 min walk santiago metro station metro madrid superb efficient clean cheap 1 euro fare madrid airport nearby metro station also great getting town centre sol station 15 mins away 1 euro prefer taxi cost 6 euros route takes past interesting sights going back hotel staff proved helpful friendly really nice welcomed room complementary bottle fruit basket rooms clean well maintained hotel nice atmosphere particularly ground floor bar must assume previous reviewers visited pre refurb hard fault hotel 34 star city centre hotel summer roof top pool closed september still access really nice spa 9th floor gym equipment hot tub breakfast hotel fantastic 20 euros per room get huge selection fruit pastries cooked food items fresh pancakes list goes madrid fantastic city christmas time place beautiful lights plenty weekend break although beware long queues see palace hotel located next door santiago took tour football stadium added bonus seeing david team leaving coach game saturday evening dined football stadium restuarant overlooking quality restaurant reasonable prices providing unique location hotel also situated close shopping centre huge good department store el corte ingles sum go enjoy madrid super weekend break good quality hotel good location stay holiday inn ignore negative reviews

Reviews.Content: stay hotel 1 night business trip earlier month october 2006 hotel seen better days elevators recently refurbished lighting lobby could entire football stadium room smelly without going detail far much previous liking staff laid back casual say least take one example fire alarm went 1am local time particularly loud fire alarm sounded floors noted headed fire escape outside building room talking partner heard alarm go clearly enough colleagues rooms asleep hear alarm go slept right makes hotel trap alarm eventually night manager seemed think whole event shoulders asked problem may regular never ever hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location”

Reviews.Content: stayed holiday inn madrid 3 nights first week march standard holiday inn room two double beds room opposed two twin beds often find europe arrangement made much easier accomodate two children two adults room clean nice basket fresh fruit bottle wine waiting us arrived bathroom good size tubshower staff friendly helpful everyone spoke excellent english location probably best suited business travelers miles outside main tourist district hotel located close subway stop however access plaza del sol prado museum etc quite easy hotel located area close many restaurants stores mall also restaurant hotel fairly good dinner

Reviews.Title: “Old fashioned but good location”
Reviews.Author: AMTLondon
Reviews.Content: stayed bank holiday weekend reading previous reviews consider changing hotel glad staff polite helpful room quite spacious noisy breakfast good lots choice pool rooftop gym facilities felt overall bad place stay city walk one day stopping along way numerous bars know receive reasonable standard holiday inn pretty much fussy could fault hotel would stay

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel, large room. Hotel in need of updating.”
Reviews.Author: alsobidingmytime
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel may 2005 business trip due normal hotel fully booked paid tax parking breakfast included hotel really showing age style reception area bedroom average nothing bad would expect money getting wireless internet access room despite showing good signal never actually got work make matters worse outside lines available telephone number hours meant office possible would recommend staying many better ones madrid less money

Reviews.Title: “Good value for your money”
Reviews.Author: sery1000
Reviews.Content: good hotel holiday inns go generally agree comments made previous reviewers however would make one point regarding location bars restaurants plenty shops area hotel situated north city centre metro hotel real madrid stadium long walk old town attractions royal palace prado youll probably find using metro taxis quite lot dont bother bus takes ages used hotel business trip moving downtown hotel villa real weekend price standard charm perfect location nothing wrong holiday inn would advise travellers find better downtown budget

Reviews.Title: “Well located near public transport, comfortable old fashioned rooms”
Reviews.Author: maggieferrua
Reviews.Content: found front desk staff members polite professional requests answered short time superb problem chose eat huge variety goes exercise equipment sauna great place end long work day relax whirlpool problem found tv bit loud hear strongly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Fine hotel in central location”

Reviews.Content: hotel perfect location within walking distance royal palace plaza mayor gran via etc choice three metro stations nearby trains new underground also clean cheap room large modern facilities including safe kept historical features including balcony breakfast room beautiful range food hot cold amazing bar reasonable bottle wine room service 10 euros staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Just great!”

Reviews.Content: great stay tryp ambassador hotel spotless attention detail second none flowers reception one example hotel close centre away form busy streets best breakfast hotel beautiful staff helpful rooms well laid spacious madrid beautiful place visit hotel made stay excellent 5 nights away felt like 10 dining beers great value dont afraid wander main streets little great food beer better prices ps check de san

Reviews.Content: sitting tapas bar across street tryp ambassador wanted share wonderful experience came madrid alone could pleased hotel greeted warmly reception staff excellent hotel great location short lively walk everywhere hotel rooms large beautiful marble looking hardwood floor bathrooms large marble large tub bidet breakfast nice included many rates hotel short walk metro staff great could happier tryp ambassador great rates love beautiful madrid

Reviews.Content: design hotel etc traditional spanish hotel always practical functional traditional spanish hotels pleasure stay hotel stayed several times future aswell hotel central location close gran via opera royal palace rooms big plenty room luggage yes hangers clothes

Reviews.Content: great location pretty hotel entrance looks like drive way laid hotel lobby room past reception almost hard remember way halls didnt love service half people nice couple people rude like one men served breakfast stay work 6 whole days staff nice remembered breakfast man angry coming breakfast 1015 stopped serving breakfast saying everyday everyday spanish great way start day im entertainment late film closing rooms huge old school funny window great decor little warm well decorated could hear noise like others tvs staff outside doors slamming lock room pretty impossible work internet really makes hard work construction one wing would stay elsewhere next time

Reviews.Content: located less minute away opera house central location hotel meant able walk main sights staff friendly without pay extra upgraded us suite rooms cleaned every day everything worked expected decor especially bathroom little dated added charm
